article.title: Wyle Laboratories Supports Hawkeye Aircraft for Multiple Countries
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Wyle Laboratories Incorporated, Huntsville, Alabama, is being awarded a contact modification of more than $28 million for continued E-2C/E-2D/C-2 planning, program, and financial services in support of the Navy and the governments of France, Taiwan, Egypt, Japan, Singapore and Canada under the Foreign Military Sales program.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
